entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having sent a brown owl to Sirius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student who is being teased by others about Viktor Krum missing her.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: A person mentioned as someone Hermione is worried about missing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, whose ears turn red when he gets embarrassed.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who receives a letter from Harry via owl post.

relationships.description: Hermione is worried that Viktor Krum will miss her, implying a relationship between them.
